body: Hi Tim. Thanks for reporting this. I'm sure Chris or Djordje will get back to you for this issue soon. Meanwhile you can also use createLegend Component and create your own legend. Here is an example: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/create-cust...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/create-custom-legend-problem?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1384205&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987)
